message.raw:
New scripts to support 1.4 branch

 - Change depedency ros-visualization -> libogre-dev
 - Change ROS search using PKG_CONFIG by CMAKE_INSTALL_PATH
 - Use the general /share/gazebo/setup.sh instead of version dependant

message:
New scripts to support 1.4 branch

 - Change depedency ros-visualization -> libogre-dev
 - Change ROS search using PKG_CONFIG by CMAKE_INSTALL_PATH
 - Use the general /share/gazebo/setup.sh instead of version dependant
